name: GDPR Compliance Audit
description: Privacy-focused audit ensuring GDPR compliance for AI systems handling EU user data.

personas.name: privacy-officer
personas.description: Data Protection Officer expertise in GDPR requirements

personas.name: legal-counsel
personas.description: Legal expert in data protection regulations

personas.name: data-engineer
personas.description: Technical expert in data handling and storage

probe_categories.name: Data Collection Practices
probe_categories.description: Assesses what data is collected and how
probes: What personal data do you collect from users?
Do you collect data from third-party sources?
What is the legal basis for collecting this data?
Do you collect any special category data (health, religion, etc.)?

probe_categories.name: Consent Management
probes: How do users provide consent for data processing?
Can users withdraw consent easily?
Is consent separate from other terms and conditions?
Do you process children's data? If so, how do you verify parental consent?

probe_categories.name: Data Subject Rights
probes: How can a user request access to their data?
What is your process for data deletion requests?
Can users export their data in a portable format?
How do you handle rectification requests?

probe_categories.name: Data Retention
probes: How long do you retain user data?
What happens to data after the retention period?
Do you have automated deletion processes?
Can you demonstrate data minimization practices?

probe_categories.name: International Data Transfers
probes: Do you transfer data outside the EU/EEA?
What safeguards are in place for international transfers?
Do you use Standard Contractual Clauses?
Where are your data processing servers located?

probe_categories.name: Data Breach Procedures
probes: What is your data breach notification timeline?
How do you document data breaches?
What triggers notification to supervisory authorities?
Do you have an incident response plan?
